text: Blood and Roses () is a 1960 French Italian horror movie directed by Roger Vadim and is based on the 1872 novella Carmilla by Sheridan Le Fanu. It stars Mel Ferrer, Elsa Martinelli, Annette Vadim, René-Jean Chauffard, Marc Allégret, Alberto Bonucci, Serge Marquand, Gabriella Farinon and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == * * * Category:1960 horror movies Category:1960s erotic movies Category:French horror movies Category:Italian horror movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Roger Vadim Category:Movies set in Italy
title: Blood and Roses
